Spirit Healer.name: Spirit Healer
Spirit Healer.desc: Regenerate 5% Health over 5s for every 500 Mod Power spent. Level 10: Allies within 15m are healed for 50% of the primary effect.

Bandit.name: Bandit
Bandit.desc: On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon. Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.desc: Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.

Bottom Feeder.name: Bottom Feeder
Bottom Feeder.desc: Increases this weapon's Ranged Damage by 5% for every 20% reserve ammo missing. Level 10: When the weapon runs out of ammo, it gains infinite ammo for 5s. Can only happen once every 60s.

Bottom Heavy.name: Bottom Heavy
Bottom Heavy.desc: Increases Fire Rate by 7.5% and an additional 1% for every 10% of Magazine missing. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased by 20% when this weapon's magazine is empty.

Bulletweaver.name: Bulletweaver
Bulletweaver.desc: Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10% for 7s. Level 10: Reloading from empty increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.

Deadly Calm.name: Deadly Calm
Deadly Calm.desc: Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s.  Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.

Dreadful.name: Dreadful
Dreadful.desc: Increases Ranged Damage by 2% for every 10% of total Health present as Grey Health. Max 20% increase. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed for this weapon by 15% while Grey Health is present.

Extender.name: Extender
Extender.desc: Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%. Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%

Failsafe.name: Failsafe
Failsafe.desc: Attached Mod deals 10% additional Mod Damage. Level 10: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chace to not consume charge.

Feedback.name: Feedback
Feedback.desc: Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack. Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.

Fetid Wounds.name: Fetid Wounds
Fetid Wounds.desc: Increases Critical Chance of this weapon by 3% per unique Negative Status Effect on the enemy. Max 15% increase. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply CORRODED, dealing 200 CORROSIVE damage over 10s.

Ghost Shell.name: Ghost Shell
Ghost Shell.desc: After 3 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20%. Level 10: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.

Harmonizer.name: Harmonizer
Harmonizer.desc: Increases Mod Damage by 10%.  Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.

Ingenuity.name: Ingenuity
Ingenuity.desc: Reduces the Heat Generation of this weapon by 25%. Level 10: Reload Speed is increased up to 50% based on this weapon's Heat accumulation.

Kill Switch.name: Kill Switch
Kill Switch.desc: Switching to this weapon creates an Explosive Burst which deals 50 Damage to all enemies within 7m. Level 10: This weapon's kills with any Explosive Damage reduce Kill Switch cooldown by 1s

Lithely.name: Lithely
Lithely.desc: Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks. Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.

Maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom.desc: Increases this weaponâ€˜s Elemental Damage by 5.5% for each unique Elemental Status Effect on the target. Level 10: Increases Mod Power Generation of Elemental Damage and Elemental Status damage by 20%.

Momentum.name: Momentum
Momentum.desc: When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks. Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.

Prophecy.name: Prophecy
Prophecy.desc: Using this weapon's mod increases Mod Power Generation by 3% for 10s. Max 5 stacks. Level 10: Reduces Mod Power requirement of this weapon's mod by 10%.

Refunder.name: Refunder
Refunder.desc: Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves. Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.

Sequenced Shot.name: Sequenced Shot
Sequenced Shot.desc: This weapon's Charged Shots decrease the Charge time of Subsequent Charge Shots by 10% for 3s. Level 10: While active, Charged Primary Shots grant 1% Ranged Critical Chance per round spent. Max 20%.

Slayer.name: Slayer
Slayer.desc: Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s.  Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.

Sleeper.name: Sleeper
Sleeper.desc: This weapon becomes EMPOWERED when stowed for 7 seconds, granting 20% Critical Chance for 3 seconds after it is drawn. Level 10: While EMPOWERED, increases Critical Damage of this weapon by 15%.

Supercharger.name: Supercharger
Supercharger.desc: Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10%. Level 10: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rigles gain 15% Critical Chance.

Timewave.name: Timewave
Timewave.desc: Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s. Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

Transpose.name: Transpose
Transpose.desc: Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s.  Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.

Twisting Wounds.name: Twisting Wounds
Twisting Wounds.desc: Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10% to BLEEDING targets. Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 100 BLEED damage over 10s.
